graphql.query:
query getTransactions {
  transactions(limit: 3, transferNextToken: "null", transferRequestNextToken: "null", filter: {}) {
    transferNextToken
    transferRequestNextToken
    transferHasMorePages
    transferRequestHasMorePages
    items {
      belongsTo
      createdAt
      amount
      behavior
      code
      currency
      description
      type
      requestState
      requestDetails {
        id
        name
        kashtag
        state
        amount
      }
      transactionDetails {
        remittanceAmount
        subType
        remittanceCurrency
        remittanceCountry
      }
      involved {
        id
        name
        kashtag
        transactionType
        destination
        destinationName
        destinationKashtag
        destinationCurrency
        destinationAmount
        service {
          reference
          company
          service
          billOwner
          dueDate
          payingService
          receipt
          referenceCode
        }
        card
      }
      kashtag
      card
      reversal
      fee
      favorite
    }
  }
}

body.raw:
{
    "source": {{idPaymentInstrument}},
    "currency": "{{currencyValue}}",
    "serviceCost": 0,
    "amount": {{amountTransferValue}},
    "description": "Test transfer to Card, Select to Contact {{nameTranCardValue}}",
    "notFastFundsAccepted": false,
    "addToFavorite": {{addToFavoriteValue}},
    "repeatTransfer": false,
    "operation": "CONTACT",
    "contactId": "{{tranCardContactIdValue}}"
}

request.description: Obtiene el lenguaje del token, en caso este seteado como espaol el lenguaje, la repuestas seran en espaol

response.name: Successfully response List settings example

request.description: Dado los parametros reasons enviados, si el usuario no ha solicitado anteriomente eliminar la cuenta o ya han pasado 48h. Crear solicitud y enviar correo. Se almacena en la propiedad reasons de la tabla user_deletion_request el/los reason enviados

query getTransactions {
  transactions(limit: 20, transferNextToken: "null", transferRequestNextToken: "null", filter: {type: "transfers", condition: "behavior =:behavior", behavior: "debit"}) {
    transferNextToken
    transferRequestNextToken
    transferHasMorePages
    transferRequestHasMorePages
    items {
      belongsTo
      createdAt
      amount
      behavior
      code
      currency
      description
      type
      requestState
      requestDetails {
        id
        name
        kashtag
        state
        amount
      }
      transactionDetails {
        remittanceAmount
        subType
        remittanceCurrency
        remittanceCountry
      }
      involved {
        id
        name
        kashtag
        transactionType
        destination
        destinationName
        destinationKashtag
        destinationCurrency
        destinationAmount
        service {
          reference
          company
          service
          billOwner
          dueDate
          payingService
          receipt
          referenceCode
        }
        card
      }
      kashtag
      card
      reversal
      fee
      favorite
    }
  }
}

body.raw:
{
  "source": {{idPaymentInstrument}},
  "currency": "{{currencyValue}}",
  "serviceCost": 0,
  "amount": {{amountDynamicQrValue}},
  "description": "Test transfer to Dynamic QR {{destinationKashtagValue}}",
  "notFastFundsAccepted": false,
  "addToFavorite": {{addToFavoriteValue}},
  "repeatTransfer": false,
  "operation": "QR_TRANSFER",
  "destinationUserId": "{{cognitoSubValue}}",
  "destinationKashtag": "{{kashtagValue}}"
}

{
  "source": {{idPaymentInstrument}},
  "currency": "{{currencyValue}}",
  "serviceCost": 0,
  "amount": {{amountRequestValue}},
  "description": "Test transfer to Request Money {{kashtagValue}}",
  "notFastFundsAccepted": false,
  "addToFavorite": {{addToFavoriteValue}},
  "repeatTransfer": true,
  "requestID": "{{requestIDValue}}",
  "destinationUserId": "{{cognitoSubValue}}",
  "destinationKashtag": "{{kashtagValue}}"
}
